ovdesc.p: This application holds the log , when external source is dumped into T24 system.

desc.p: This field holds the log information of the dumping operation performed, for the source.
Identifies which external source has been dumped into T24 system, and when.
Up to 21 alphanumeric characters of the form: [Source name].DDMMYY.HHMM Date and time portions of the id are picked up from the system.
